item.title: How to Focus
item.description: Reference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lwX8d5ebnmc&ab_channel=ThomasFrank Get Direction through a 5 minute prep soak in details for the task break the task down create time estimate get clear on context e.g. Focus Video Prepare Script draft gold mining analogy Diffuse Mode Thinking go for a 20 minute walk clean your room do something to get your mind off “I only write when inspired. I’m inspired everyday at 9am”
